definition: to mention/to raise (a subject)/to refer to
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid
to (a place)/until (a time)/up to/to go/to arrive/(verb complement denoting completion or result of an action)

sentences.english: It is worth noting that the monohydrate is not mentioned in the literature.
sentences.chinese: 值得指出的是，在本文獻中沒有提到一水化物。

sentences.english: Last installment I mentioned some of the big - picture aspects of creating an exe packer.
sentences.chinese: 上一部分我提到了關於製作加殼程序主要方面。

sentences.english: In the speech the speaker spoke about you.
sentences.chinese: 在這個講演中，講演者提到了你。

sentences.english: When was the last time anyone mentioned microkernels in a conversation?
sentences.chinese: 你最後一次與人談話中提到微內核是什麼時候？

sentences.english: I also do the deep breathing and self-massage mentioned above as I do so.
sentences.chinese: 在閒步中也做上文提到的深呼吸和自我推拿運動。

sentences.english: Please specify the mentioned shipment is for R9.
sentences.chinese: 請註明所提到的貨物爲R9是。

sentences.english: "There were thousands of them, " a villager told a local newspaper.
sentences.chinese: “青蛙的數量成千上萬，”某村民向當地報社提到。

sentences.english: Many of the channel impairments described above can be mitigated on-chip using equalization.
sentences.chinese: 上面提到的信道損害可以在芯片上用均等化來減輕。

sentences.english: During a chat, Zheng said that he once worked as an electrician.
sentences.chinese: 在閒談中，鄭某提到了他曾是一名電工。

sentences.english: This makes him some unwell, total can say the compel tallest, each moment guard opposition.
sentences.chinese: 這讓他有些不適，總將武能提到最高，時刻提防。

sentences.english: The next new bulletin, shorter than usual, made no mention of the demonstration.
sentences.chinese: 下一個新聞節目比通常短，沒有提到旅行。

sentences.english: Apologists for religion point to charitable works as some sort of justification for it.
sentences.chinese: 辯護者提到慈善事業作爲爲宗教辯護的理由。

sentences.english: It's all in those side effects I mentioned.
sentences.chinese: 其實都在那些我提到的副作用當中。

sentences.english: Zurvan is mentioned in the Origins of Alchemy Shamanic &Esoteric.
sentences.chinese: 祖以萬在薩滿教和深奧的鍊金術起源中被提到。

sentences.english: Hume referred to the latter type of axioms as "self-evident" truths.
sentences.chinese: 休謨提到的“不言自明的”真理公理後一種類型。

sentences.english: Simeon's this holy man living in the temple, again there's that theme of the temple.
sentences.chinese: 西面是住在聖殿中的聖人，這裏又再次提到了聖殿。

definition: to mention/to raise (a subject)/to bring to sb's attention
to talk about/to mention/(preposition) as for
pertaining to/concerning/with regard to/about/a matter of
to refer to/to speak about/to talk about
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid
to think of/to call to mind/to anticipate
to mention/to bring up (a subject)/with regard to/as for
